events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund because the size doesnâ€™t fit me at all.
The complaint was classified as a refund request based on customer mentioning money back and return of product.
Support agent Emily Johnson assigned to handle this refund case for the customer requesting a return.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return the jacket and request a refund. I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has been opened or worn at all? This helps us process the refund.
The order number is 987654321. I have not worn the jacket; the tags are still attached and it is in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and refund approval. I appreciate the help and will ship the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount reflected in your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Hi again! Just checking in to make sure that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if further assistance is needed.
Since the refund has been successfully completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your cooperation.
